name: gjöf
notes:
"gjöf," meaning "gift" or "present" in icelandic, is a pattern created by védís jónsdóttir for nordic craft week. it features léttlopi yarn and comes in both white and black versions.



body and sleeves are worked in the round from lower edge to underarms, then joined to work yoke in the round.

needles needed:
circular needles 4.5 mm, 40 and 80 cm
circular needle 3.5 mm, 80 cm
double pointed needles 4.5 and 3.5 mm

design: védís jónsdóttir
for heimilisiðnaðarfélag íslands - nordic craft week
